attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although, rightly, Foreign Secretary David Miliband is reported on AOL today as saying that, "while the Government accepted the case for an inquiry, it should wait until British troops had completed their mission in Iraq.

"We think the priority of Government and our armed services should be to the situation in Iraq, not to the servicing of an inquiry," he said.

The petitioner is requesting the PM to send somebody more senior than my MP to the NW to discuss (confidentially) my PhD research.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
